name: Tung
description:
Tung is a 2D puzzle platformer made for Weekly Game Jam #122! The theme for this jam was 'One Action', so in this game the one thing you can do is stick your tongue out to attach it to blocks. Certain blocks can be used to to help move you through each level. 

There are 8 levels to complete. The first 4 will teach you how to play. 

Play Windows version for best experience.
